mapper.insert: INSERT INTO KOS_CART( KCNUM, KPID, KPNAME, KPFILE, KPCNT, KPPRICE, KPPRICESUM, KPNUM, KMNUM, DELETEYN, INSERTDATE, UPDATEDATE ) VALUES ( #{kcnum}, #{kpid}, #{kpname}, #{kpfile}, #{kpcnt}, #{kpprice}, #{kppricesum}, #{kpnum}, #{kmnum}, 'Y', SYSDATE, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT A.KCNUM KCNUM ,A.KPID KPID ,A.KPNAME KPNAME ,A.KPCNT KPCNT ,A.KPFILE KPFILE ,A.KPPRICE KPPRICE ,A.KPPRICESUM KPPRICESUM ,A.KPNUM KPNUM ,A.KMNUM KMNUM ,A.DELETEYN DELETEYN ,TO_CHAR(A.INSERTDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') INSERTDATE ,TO_CHAR(A.UPDATEDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') UPDATEDATE FROM KOS_CART A WHERE A.DELETEYN = 'Y' AND A.KMNUM = #{kmnum} ORDER BY 1 DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE KOS_CART SET DELETEYN = 'N', UPDATEDATE = SYSDATE WHERE KCNUM = #{kcnum}

update.foreach: UPDATE KOS_CART SET DELETEYN = 'N', UPDATEDATE = SYSDATE WHERE KCNUM = #{item.kcnum}
